message: I propose dividing the money with a 70:30 split in favor of Alice. This allows us both to benefit from the initial amount, while considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60:40 split in my favor.  While I acknowledge the decreasing value of the money, a more equitable split is fairer in the long run.
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds, acknowledging the decreasing value of money and aiming for fairness in our distribution.
